import Layout from '../components/PageLayout'; import PlainText from '../components/PlainText'; import { TwitterTimelineEmbed, TwitterShareButton, TwitterFollowButton, TwitterHashtagButton, TwitterMentionButton, TwitterTweetEmbed, TwitterMomentShare, TwitterDMButton, TwitterVideoEmbed, TwitterOnAirButton } from 'react-twitter-embed'; const contentBacker = { backgroundColor:'#000000cd', padding: 20, marginTop: 20, borderRadius:10 } const Index = () => (

Welcome

Welcome to the SpongeBob SquarePants: Battle for Bikini Bottom community homepage and resource. This site has a primary focus on speedrunning, but we also provide other resources related to the game. If you are interested in speedrunning, take a look at our Getting Started guide. You may also check out the community stream above.

{/* This is our twitter */}
); export default Index;
